Hospital.Argument

Class BasicArgument<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • Hospital.Argument.BasicArgument<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the answer to this Argument
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    PublicArgument<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BooleanArgument, IntegerArgument, NoneArgument, PriorityArgument, StringArgument, TimeArgument

    @SystemAPI
public abstract class BasicArgument<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements PublicArgument<T>
    A BasicArgument has a question to ask the user, the answer of which must be able to be parsed to a given type. Children of this class are used to communicate between the UI and the SystemLayer. Eg.: Treatments sometimes needs different arguments: String/Integer/Boolean.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BasicArgument(java.lang.String question)
      This creates the Argument with a given question
